about_the_game:
Pixel Pack 4
Iconsets

2 Sets of Icons great for creating your own unique fantasy world!

Icons in 2 different styles.

Pack Contents:
system(Icons): 2 sheet （652 x 2）

Pixel packs from Sloppy Joe Studios can be used in both Commercial & Non-commercial games.
